startedDateTime.description: Date and time stamp for the beginning of the page load (ISO 8601 - YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD, e.g. 2009-07-24T19:20:30.45+01:00).

id.description: Unique identifier of a page within the <log>. Entries use it to refer the parent page.

pageTimings.description: Detailed timing info about page load.

comment.description: A comment provided by the user or the application.
